CustomField.description: Aug2018Release: new field "Marketing Suspended" checkbox (Lead and Contact Object). To be used by Contact Owner/Sales to inform Marketing to interrupt emailing/calling etc. the Contact. At Lead conversion, field is copied to Contact record.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Check this box to inform Marketing to interrupt emailing/calling this Contact for approximately a 4 month timeframe.
CustomField.label: Marketing Suspended
